member.summary: Gets all alarms from the Alarms folder.

member.name: E:EonEggTimer.CodeIsle.Timers.TimerBase.Started
member.summary: Event fires when the timer is started.

member.name: E:EonEggTimer.CodeIsle.Timers.TimerBase.Paused
member.summary: Event fires when the timer is paused.

member.name: E:EonEggTimer.CodeIsle.Timers.TimerBase.Restarted
member.summary: Event fires when the timer is restarted.

member.name: E:EonEggTimer.CodeIsle.Timers.TimerBase.Expired
member.summary: Event fires when the timer is expired.

member.name: M:EonEggTimer.CodeIsle.Timers.TimerBase.OnStarted(System.Object,EonEggTimer.TimerEventArgs)
member.summary: Raises started event.

member.name: M:EonEggTimer.CodeIsle.Timers.TimerBase.OnPaused(System.Object,EonEggTimer.TimerEventArgs)
member.summary: Raises paused event.

member.name: M:EonEggTimer.CodeIsle.Timers.TimerBase.OnExpired(System.Object,EonEggTimer.TimerEventArgs)
member.summary: Raises expired event.

member.name: M:EonEggTimer.CodeIsle.Timers.TimerBase.OnRestarted(System.Object,EonEggTimer.TimerEventArgs)
member.summary: Raises restarted event.

member.name: M:EonEggTimer.CodeIsle.Timers.TimerBase.StartEnabledPoll
member.summary: Used to start polling if the timer should be disabled.

member.name: M:EonEggTimer.CodeIsle.Timers.TimerBase.StopEnabledPoll
member.summary: Used to stop polling if the timer should be enabled.

member.name: M:EonEggTimer.CodeIsle.Timers.TimerBase.#ctor(System.TimeSpan)
member.summary: Provieds a set of methods and properties that you can use to accurately measure elapsed time.

member.name: M:EonEggTimer.CodeIsle.Timers.TimerBase.#ctor(System.TimeSpan,System.Int32)
member.summary: Provieds a set of methods and properties that you can use to accurately measure elapsed time.

member.name: M:EonEggTimer.CodeIsle.Timers.TimerBase.#ctor(System.TimeSpan,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Provieds a set of methods and properties that you can use to accurately measure elapsed time.

member.name: M:EonEggTimer.CodeIsle.Timers.TimerBase.Start
member.summary: Starts, or resumes, measuring elapsed time for an interval.

member.name: M:EonEggTimer.CodeIsle.Timers.TimerBase.Expire
member.summary: Expires the timer.

member.name: M:EonEggTimer.CodeIsle.Timers.TimerBase.Pause
member.summary: Stops measuring elapsed time for an interval.

member.name: P:EonEggTimer.CodeIsle.Timers.TimerBase.IsPaused
member.summary: Gets the value indicating if the tiner is paused.

member.name: P:EonEggTimer.CodeIsle.Timers.TimerBase.IsExpired
member.summary: Gets the value indicating if the timer is expired.

member.name: M:EonEggTimer.CodeIsle.Timers.TimerBase.Reset
member.summary: Stops the timer and resets the elapsed time to zero.

member.name: M:EonEggTimer.CodeIsle.Timers.TimerBase.Reset(System.TimeSpan)
member.summary: Stops the timer, resets the elapsed time to zero, and sets duration.

member.name: M:EonEggTimer.CodeIsle.Timers.TimerBase.Restart
member.summary: Stops the timer, resets the elapsed time to zero, and starts the timer.

member.name: P:EonEggTimer.CodeIsle.Timers.TimerBase.Enabled
member.summary: Gets the value indicating whether the timer is running.

member.name: P:EonEggTimer.CodeIsle.Timers.TimerBase.Duration
member.summary: Gets the duration measured by the current instance.

member.name: P:EonEggTimer.CodeIsle.Timers.TimerBase.Elapsed
member.summary: Gets the total elapsed time measured by the current instance.

member.name: P:EonEggTimer.CodeIsle.Timers.TimerBase.Remaining
member.summary: Gets the remaining time measured by the current instance.

member.name: P:EonEggTimer.CodeIsle.Timers.TimerBase.Current
member.summary: Gets the current display time measured by the current instance.

member.name: M:EonEggTimer.CodeIsle.Timers.TimerBase.ExpiredPollAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Polls whether the timer has expired.

member.name: M:EonEggTimer.LoopStream.#ctor(NAudio.Wave.WaveStream)
member.summary: Creates a new Loop stream
member.param: The stream to read from. Note: the Read method of this stream should return 0 when it reaches the end or else we will not loop to the start again.

member.name: P:EonEggTimer.LoopStream.EnableLooping
member.summary: Use this to turn looping on or off

member.name: P:EonEggTimer.LoopStream.WaveFormat
member.summary: Return source stream's wave format

member.name: P:EonEggTimer.LoopStream.Length
member.summary: LoopStream simply returns

member.name: P:EonEggTimer.LoopStream.Position
member.summary: LoopStream simply passes on positioning to source stream

member.name: T:EonEggTimer.LoopStream
member.summary: Stream for looping playback
